ProjectTitle: The central role of the duodenal microenvironment in functional dyspepsia.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 18/07/2022 7. [REDACTED] have you considered using repositories for data preservation and sharing, maybe the EMBL-EBI repositories may be suitable (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/)? [REDACTED] data for which there is no good disciplinary repository you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr). [REDACTED] can restrict access to the datasets if needed but your data will get a DOI or accession number that you can use in your publication, and the metadata that repositories add makes the data more findable.
label: good with suggestions
